choicesHtml: an outpost for Phoenician traders dating back to 2,000 B.C.E.
a thriving fourteenth-century Shona site that was part of an extensive trade network
a remote and secure fortress for Shona leaders during fifteenth-century periods of unrest
a meeting point for merchants traveling to and from the Swahili coast
